channel.title: Reading on Ruchil Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in Reading on Ruchil Sharma

item.title: What am I Reading These Days
item.description: With ~ 21 more books in the bag, the lockdown has turned out to be quite productive. Although I have tried to maintain variety in the kind of books and content that I read, a couple of books that have stood out for me are : Courage To Be Disliked by Ichiro Ishimi and Atomic Habits by James Clear. Going candid on this one: Stating the names and description of the books that I liked and have read thus far:
